intro: A love triangle full of secrets, difficult decisions and unexpected twists and turns. True love or friendship, your choice will change everything!
description:
Enter a story where love, friendship and secrets are intertwined in a plot full of emotion. You're falling in love with a boy, but your best friend has a secret love for you, suffering in silence... What will you do when relationships get complicated and your decisions can change everything?

Every choice you make will affect the fate of all three characters. Will you support your best friend in confessing his love? Will you let the love between you and the boy you like move forward? Every moment is filled with tension and unexpected twists and turns, where unrequited love and inner doubts will test your loyalty and your feelings.

With beautiful graphics, immersive music and a story that will make you question your own feelings, you will live a unique experience. Face exciting dilemmas, choose wisely and find out what the future holds for these three friends - true love or foolproof friendship? The story is in your hands!
